SEARCH
Package architecture.model

Class StudentManager

java.lang.Object
architecture.model.StudentManager
public class StudentManager extends Object
Manages Students, files and storage interactions.

    • storagePG

      Connection to PG storage.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentManager

      public StudentManager()
      Loads records from the storage files into recordsUG and recordsPG. If couldn't load the records, initializes recordsUG and recordsPG with empty ArrayList.

  • Method Details

    • addRecordUG

      Adds UG Student Record into recordsUG.
      Parameters:
      record - Take Student as parameter.

    • addRecordUG

      public void addRecordUG(String[] values)
      Adds UG Student Record into recordsUG.
      Parameters:
      values - A String with values in order: {RollNo, Name, Course, Department, Branch, College}.

    • addRecordPG

      public void addRecordPG(Student record)
      Adds PG Student Record into recordsPG.
      Parameters:
      record - Take Student as parameter.

    • addRecordPhD

      public void addRecordPhD(String[] values)
      Adds PhD Student Record into recordsPG.
      Parameters:
      values - A String with values in order: {RollNo, Name, Course, Department, Topic, Supervisor}.

    • addRecordMaster

      public void addRecordMaster(String[] values)
      Adds Master Student Record into recordsPG.
      Parameters:
      values - Takes Student as parameter. {RollNo, Name, Course, Department, Specialization, Project}.

    • addRecordScientist

      public void addRecordScientist(String[] values)
      Adds Scientist Student Record into recordsPG.
      Parameters:
      values - Takes Student as parameter. {RollNo, Name, Course, Department, Area}.
